org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.failover

类 FailoverStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.executiongraph.failover.FailoverStrategy
  • 直接已知子类:
    RestartAllStrategy, RestartIndividualStrategy, RestartPipelinedRegionStrategy

    public abstract class FailoverStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
    A FailoverStrategy describes how the job computation recovers from task failures.

    Failover strategies implement recovery logic for failures of tasks. The execution graph still implements "global failure / recovery" (which restarts all tasks) as a fallback plan or safety net in cases where it deems that the state of the graph may have become inconsistent.

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static interface  FailoverStrategy.Factory
      This factory is a necessary indirection when creating the FailoverStrategy to that we can have both the FailoverStrategy final in the ExecutionGraph, and the ExecutionGraph final in the FailOverStrategy.

    • 方法详细资料

      • onTaskFailure

        public abstract void onTaskFailure(Execution taskExecution,
                                   java.lang.Throwable cause)
        Called by the execution graph when a task failure occurs.
        参数:
        taskExecution - The execution attempt of the failed task.
        cause - The exception that caused the task failure.

      • notifyNewVertices

        public abstract void notifyNewVertices(java.util.List<ExecutionJobVertex> newJobVerticesTopological)
        Called whenever new vertices are added to the ExecutionGraph.
        参数:
        newJobVerticesTopological - The newly added vertices, in topological order.

      • getStrategyName

        public abstract java.lang.String getStrategyName()
        Gets the name of the failover strategy, for logging purposes.

      • registerMetrics

        public void registerMetrics(MetricGroup metricGroup)
        Tells the FailoverStrategy to register its metrics.

        The default implementation does nothing

        参数:
        metricGroup - The metric group to register the metrics at
